# proxyAutoConfigurationJavaScript

**Instance Property**

A string containing the Proxy Auto Configuration (PAC) JavaScript source code.

## Declaration

```swift
var proxyAutoConfigurationJavaScript: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEProxySettings/autoProxyConfigurationEnabled] is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] then the system will execute the PAC script to determine what proxies to use (if any) for HTTP and HTTPS connections.

## Accessing Automatic Proxy Properties

- **autoProxyConfigurationEnabled**: A Boolean indicating if proxy auto-configuration is enabled.
- **proxyAutoConfigurationURL**: A URL specifying the location from where the Proxy Auto Configuration (PAC) script should be downloaded.
